rows.label: tlk70000006_06_msg0001
rows.name:
Freja-chan's loads better now. It's hard to
believe that she's been ill up until just
the other day!

rows.label: tlk70000006_06_msg0002
rows.name:
Anyway, we promised we'd all go to
the city together.

rows.label: tlk70000006_06_msg0003
rows.name:
Freja-chan said she'd like to try looking after
the Armus sometime too.

rows.label: tlk70000006_06_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm so glad she's doing well now.
Everyone's tripping over each other
to hang out with her.

rows.label: tlk70000006_06_msg0005
rows.name:
It's like everything's more fun now we've
got the whole team together.

rows.label: tlk70000006_06_msg0006
rows.name:
We're mucking about and having a
laugh the whole time. It's brilliant!

rows.label: tlk70000006_06_msg0007
rows.name:
When I go to bed, I'm always thinking,
I can't wait for tomorrow! I never really
felt so good about things before...

rows.label: tlk70000006_06_msg0008
rows.name:
We're so busy having fun, we don't
have time to get bored!
